== Vellanikkara (CT) (627837) ==

Vellanikkara (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.9 sq. km. and harbouring 1578 households with total population of 6167 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 310 km. Male population is 2997 and female population is 3170. Scheduled Caste population is 367 and Scheduled Tribes population is 5. Census Location Code of the town is 627837<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 10 km.
